question: Tarikh-i-Jahan Gusha-i-Juwaini is written by which of the following authors?
explanation: In the thirteenth century, Ata Malik Juwaini wrote The Tarikh-i-Jahan Gusha-i-Juwaini. It throws more light upon the history of Central Asia than it does on India. The text is, nevertheless, considered to give an accurate account of all the information.
